document.docAuthor: Liu, Di, Cai, Bo & Feng, Jinian
document.masterDocTitle: A new species of armored scale, Fiorinia yongxingensis (Hemiptera: Coccomorpha Diaspididae) from Hainan Province, China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of armored scale, Fiorinia yongxingensis (Hemiptera: Coccomorpha Diaspididae) from Hainan Province, China

heading.emphasis:
Key to adult females of species of
Fiorinia
known from China

paragraph.keyLead: - Pygidium with marginal gland spines absent or obsolete..................................................... 13
3(2) Abdominal segments II and III with lateral gland spines...................................................... 4
- Abdominal segments II and III without lateral gland spines................................................... 10
4(3) With submarginal dorsal macroducts on basal part of pygidium................................................ 5
- Without submarginal dorsal macroducts on basal part of pygidium.............................................. 6

5(4) Antennal tubercles pointed apically, each with a short process..................................
hisakakii Takahashi

- Antennal tubercles not pointed apically, each without a short process..................................
horii Kuwana

6(4) Head tapering anteriorly; anterior spiracles each associated with 0 or 1 disc pore...................
proboscidaria Green
- Head broad and curved; anterior spiracles each associated with 2–4 disc pores.................................... 7
7(6) Prepygidial segments with small submedial dorsal ducts...................................................... 8

- Prepygidial segments without small submedial dorsal ducts.................................
rhododendri Takahashi
8(7) Pygidium with 2 pairs of marginal gland spines altogether.................................................... 9

- Pygidium with 5 pairs of marginal gland spines altogether...........................................
theae Green

9(8) Perivulvar pores numbering about 22–31 on each side......................................
formosensis Takahashi

- Perivulvar pores numbering about 44–61 on each side..........................................
vacciniae Kuwana

10(3) Tip of interantennal process pointed........................................................
fuzhouensis Young
11(10) With fewer than 11 marginal gland spines or gland tubercles from thorax to abdominal segment II.................... 12

- With about 60 marginal microducts from thorax to abdominal segment II ….......................
turpiniae Takahashi

12(11) Cephalothorax with 2 or 3 marginal gland tubercles on each side.................................
randiae Takahashi

- Cephalothorax with more than 4 marginal gland tubercles on each side …............................
euonymi Young
13(2) Pair of setae between L 1 shorter than or equal to one-half of L 1 length …........................................ 14
- Pair of setae between L 1 longer than one-half of L 1 length ….................................................. 15

14(13) Lateral lobes present on pygidium ….........................................................
linderae Takagi

- Lateral lobes absent from pygidium ….....................................................
saprosmae (Green)

16(15) Body with 2 marginal gland spines on each side …............................................
smilaceti Takahashi

17(16) Basal zygosis between L 1 slender and weakly sclerotized.....................................…
arengae Takahashi

- Basal zygosis between L 1 robust and strongly sclerotized ….....................................
taiwana Takahashi

- Prothorax without gland tubercles........................................... …
phantasma Cockerell & Robinson
20(19) With a pair of setae between L 1 ; bases of L 1 yoked together …................................................ 21
- Without a pair of setae between L 1 ; bases of L 1 fused together ….................................. ficicola Takahashi

21(20) Posterior spiracles each associated with 3 or 4 disc pores …..................................
rhododendricola Tang
- Posterior spiracles not associated with disc pores …......................................................... 22

22(21) Space between L 1 and L 2 with marginal gland spines.............................................…
horii Kuwana
- Space between L 1 and L 2 without marginal gland spines ….................................................... 23
- Metathorax without gland tubercles ….............................................. nanningensis Zhang & Feng

24(23) With a group of microducts near each anterior spiracle ….............................................
citri Young

- Without microducts near anterior spiracles …....................................................
minor Maskell
26(25) With marginal gland spines present laterad of L 1 and L 2 …................................................... 27
27(26) Pygidial macroducts numbering fewer than 7 on each side …................................................. 28
- Pygidial macroducts numbering 7 or more on each side ….................................................... 32
28(27) Cicatrices present on abdominal segment I; microducts present posterior to mouthparts ….......................... 29
- Cicatrices absent from abdominal segment I; microducts absent from posterior to mouthparts …..................... 31
29(28) Pygidium with 3 or 4 marginal macroducts on each side …................................................... 30

- Pygidium with 2–6 marginal macroducts on each side …...........................................
externa Ferris

30(29) Marginal gland spines present on abdominal segment V; with 3–15 gland tubercles on meso- and metathorax together...................................................................................…
fioriniae Targioni Tozzetti

- Marginal gland spines absent from abdominal segment V; with 4–8 gland tubercles on meso- and metathorax together ….........................................................................................
japonica Kuwana

31(28) L 2 bilobulate, inner lobule with 3 lateral notches, outer lobule with 3 or 4 lateral notches …........
cunninghamiana Young

- L 2 unilobulate, each represented by 1 broad, serrate process …....................................
quercifolii Ferris

32(27) Minute dermal spicules present on posterior margin of mouthparts …................................
myricae Young
- Minute dermal spicules absent from posterior margin of mouthparts …......................................... 33
33(32) Anterior spiracles each associated with 1–4 disc pores …..................................................... 34

- Anterior spiracles each associated with 3–11 disc pores …........................................
pinicola Maskell

34(33) Abdominal segments III and IV together with 3 marginal gland spines on each side …................
keteleeriae Young

- Abdominal segments III and IV together with 4 or 5 marginal gland spines on each side …............
camelleosae Young
36(35) With 2 or 3 submedial macroducts on each side of abdominal segment IV ….................. tianshuiensis Wei & Feng

- Without submedial macroducts on abdominal segment IV ….......................................
linderae Takagi

37(25) With about 100–120 ventral ducts near mouthparts …............................................
yunnanensis Hu

38(37) L 1 large, separated by less than width of L 1 ; pygidium with 7 marginal macroducts on each side ….......
pinicorticis Ferris

- L 1 elongate, separated by more than 2 times width of L 1 ; pygidium with 8 marginal macroducts on each side …...................................................................................................
separata Takagi
